name: Acura
0:
”Alexa, ask Acura to start my car.”
”Alexa, ask Acura to lock my doors.”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: acura
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Control your Acura vehicle with the sound of your voice. Instruct your Acura vehicle to start remotely, unlock and lock doors, flash vehicle lights, send an address to your Acura and so much more. 

Supported Vehicles:
• 2019 and newer RDX
• 2021 and newer TLX
• 2022 and newer MDX
• For the most up to date list, go to www.acuralink.com

Set Up:
• Enable the Acura Skill
• Login with your AcuraLink® credentials and link to your Amazon Alexa account 
• Select the vehicle you wish to interact with
• Agree to the Terms of Use
• Start using the Acura Skill

The Acura skill allows you to give commands, such as:
Example Utterances: 

Engine Start
“Alexa, ask Acura to start my engine.”

Extend Engine Start
“Alexa, ask Acura to keep my vehicle running.”

Lock Doors*
“Alexa, ask Acura to lock my doors.”

Unlock Door*
“Alexa, ask Acura to unlock my door.”

Flash Lights*
“Alexa, ask Acura to flash my lights.”

Flash Lights & Sound Horn*
“Alexa, ask Acura to flash the lights and sound the horn.”

Fuel Level & Drive Range
“Alexa, ask Acura how much fuel do I have?”

Odometer Information
“Alexa, ask Acura how many miles are on my car?”

Oil Life
“Alexa, ask Acura what is my oil life?”

Warning Lamp Information
“Alexa, ask Acura if I have any warning lamps on.”

Maintenance Minder Information
“Alexa, ask Acura is my car due for maintenance?”

Search for Generic Point of Interest (POI)
“Alexa, ask Acura to look for nearest (POI).”

Search for Specific POI & Send to Car
“Alexa, ask Acura for directions to (POI).” 

Send Address to Car
“Alexa, ask Acura to send an address to my vehicle.”

Basic Information on AcuraLink®
“Alexa, ask Acura what is AcuraLink®?”

Help
 “Alexa, ask Acura to help.”
 
*Skill feature only available when your linked vehicle is off.

Disclaimers: 
• A Remote trial or paid subscription package is required to use this Skill.
• To protect access to certain Skill features, such as remote start, extend engine start, lock, unlock, and horn, your AcuraLink® four digit PIN must be provided each time before Alexa can send the command to Acura. 
• It is recommended to only use this Skill in a secure and private setting. 
• Only one vehicle can be linked to the Acura Skill.
• Skill success for remote commands is heavily dependent on the vehicle being in an area with adequate cellular data connection.
• Commands may take anywhere from five to sixty (5-60) seconds to execute, depending on network conditions.
• For assistance, please visit: www.acura.com/contact-us
